home.parrafo-info: Systems Engineering student focused on Front-End Web Development. As a person who loves intuitive and aesthetically pleasing designs, I aim to create projects that provide the best user experience.

sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a Systems Engineering student and a self-taught Web Development student focused on Front-End programming.
I aspire to find employment in the Web Development world, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional life.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem-solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning from others and continuously improving myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where some of my most notable projects, my technical skills, and a bit about my education can be found.
